Riverton boat tragedy: Coastguard volunteer says survivor plucked from capsized boat, deceased trapped under vessel https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/riverton-boat-tragedy-coastguard-volunteer-says-survivor-plucked-from-capsized-boat-deceased-trapped-under-vessel/MKWODEGXGZB4PAYVJX6VMT4OPE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/riverton-boat-tragedy-coastguard-volunteer-says-survivor-plucked-from-capsized-boat-deceased-trapped-under-vessel/MKWODEGXGZB4PAYVJX6VMT4OPE/ Benjamin PlummerCoastguard volunteers were on the scene within five minutes of a mayday call. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 07:56:45 +0000 A Coastguard volunteer who responded after a boat capsized on the Riverton bar in Southland says it was “the worst accident” he has ever come across on the bar. Photo / NZH
Car collides with property in Fairview Heights, Auckland; wedged between house and retaining wall https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-collides-with-property-in-fairview-heights-auckland-wedge- Between-house-and-retaining-wall/T5PGPJW34ZDEHMCQP6N2EUFSMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-collides-with-property-in-fairview-heights-auckland-wedge- Between-house-and-retaining-wall/T5PGPJW34ZDEHMCQP6N2EUFSMY/ Police said a crane may be needed to remove the car from where it is. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 09:59:21 +0000 Emergency services are responding to an address in Auckland’s Fairview Heights where a car has collided with a house and is suspended precariously over a 3m drop. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Tipene Funerals apologises after bodies of prominent Auckland Samoans ‘treated like rubbish’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-apologises-after-bodies-of-prominent-auckland-samoans-treatment-like-rubbish/2BZMSCGHZ5FNLBQ63RH4WT2N5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-apologises-after-bodies-of-prominent-auckland-samoans-treatment-like-rubbish/2BZMSCGHZ5FNLBQ63RH4WT2N5I/ Raphael FranksA former funeral director at Tipene Funerals swindled her grieving clients. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Fiona Bakulich (inset top) was employed by Francis Tipene (inset bottom) at Tipene Funerals, but it has been revealed Bakulich swindled her clients by improperly interring their dead relatives in the public mausoleum at Waikumete Cemetery. Photos / Michael Craig, Dean Purcell

Meth psychosis: Ethan Simon jailed for stabbing Burger King workers in South Auckland without provocation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ethan-simon-jailed-for-stabbing-two-teen-workers-without-pro Vocation-at-south-auckland-burger-king/PPEKFT4CCJGR5ENJN2XENZDSOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ethan-simon-jailed-for-stabbing-two-teen-workers-without-pro Vocation-at-south-auckland-burger-king/PPEKFT4CCJGR5ENJN2XENZDSOE/ Craig KapitanEthan Simon said he was especially sad about his victims' ages after learning what he did. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Two youths were stabbed while working at Burger King last year. Ethan Simon has been sentenced for the attacks, which his lawyer says occurred while he was suffering methamphetamine-induced psychosis.

Beach Haven shooting: Alleged drug importer with links to Comancheros gang living at North Shore address targeted in drive-by shooting https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/beach-haven-shooting-alleged-drug-importer-with-links-to-comancheros-gang-living-at-north-shore-address-targeted-in-逐拍驱动/O5LN4DI6EJEQDHBWAKHT2DTIYQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/beach-haven-shooting-alleged-drug-importer-with-links-to-comancheros-gang-living-at-north-shore-address-targeted-in-逐拍驱动/O5LN4DI6EJEQDHBWAKHT2DTIYQ/ Jared Savage, George BlockThe 33-year-old on money laundering and drug charges was bailed to the Beach Haven address Sat, 03 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Police searching for evidence after a drive-by shooting in the North Shore suburb of Beach Haven. An alleged drug importer and money launderer was bailed to the targeted address. Photo / David Williams
Security guard assaulted in foiled jewellery store aggravated robbery in Mt Roskill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-guard-assaulted-in-foiled-jewellery-store-aggravated-robbery-in-mt-roskill/RAZBUT5FT5AFZI2MJ24LDAIQ6M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-guard-assaulted-in-foiled-jewellery-store-aggravated-robbery-in-mt-roskill/RAZBUT5FT5AFZI2MJ24LDAIQ6M/ Police are still hunting the armed offenders after they fled the scene. Photo / Supplied
